info.name: Syndicate Onboarding API
info.description: Complete multi-step syndicate onboarding process API collection

body.raw:
{
    "username": "john_manager",
    "email": "john@techventures.com",
    "password": "securepass123",
    "password2": "securepass123",
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Manager",
    "accredited": "Yes",
    "syndicate_name": "Tech Ventures Syndicate",
    "description": "A syndicate focused on early-stage technology investments, specializing in AI, blockchain, and SaaS companies.",
    "sector_ids": [1, 2, 3],
    "geography_ids": [1, 2, 4],
    "lp_network_count": "We have a network of 50+ accredited investors including angel investors, VCs, and family offices",
    "enable_lp_network": "Yes"
}

request.description: Step 1: Create user and syndicate with basic information
Step 2: Update syndicate with company information and team details

body.raw:
{
    "syndicate_id": {{syndicate_id}},
    "company_legal_name": "Tech Ventures LLC",
    "contact_name": "John Manager",
    "contact_position": "Managing Partner",
    "address_1": "123 Silicon Valley Blvd",
    "address_2": "Suite 456",
    "city": "San Francisco",
    "postal_code": "94105",
    "country": "United States",
    "contact_number": "+1-555-123-4567",
    "contact_email": "john@techventures.com",
    "sie_eligibility": "Yes",
    "notary_required": "No",
    "deed_required": "No",
    "terms_agreed": true
}

request.description: Step 3: Complete Know Your Business (KYB) verification with company details
Step 4: Add compliance information and regulatory attestations
Step 5: Final review and submission - returns JWT tokens
Get the current progress of syndicate onboarding
Test error handling for missing required fields
Test error handling for password mismatch
Test error handling for invalid syndicate ID
